item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Amazon tells employees to return to office five days a week (625 points | 731 comments)

5. Intel lost the Sony Playstation business to AMD (92 points | 46 comments)

10. Fair: A Go library for serving resources fairly (169 points | 35 comments)

23. Ask HN: Does anyone use sound effects in their dev environment? (160 points | 238 comments)
24. Thoughts and Observations in the Wake of Apple's 'It's Glowtime' Keynote (46 points | 35 comments)
25. Ask HN: What runs L4-related microkernels/hypervisors these days? (56 points | 32 comments)
26. Attacking PowerShell Clixml Deserialization (43 points | 11 comments)
27. Rearchitecting Core Services at X (44 points | 16 comments)

29. Paraguay Loves Mickey, the Cartoon Mouse. Disney Doesn't (166 points | 112 comments)
